```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)

zip_data <- readRDS("zip_ppp_allstates_1016.rds")
```


```{r}
zip_data_modified <- zip_data %>%
  mutate(log_days = log(days_to_approval)) %>%
  mutate(log_days = ifelse(log_days == -Inf, 0, log_days))
```


```{r}
test_regression <- 
  lm(zip_data_modified$log_days ~ 1 + zip_data_modified$estimate_median_income_dollars_families_families +
       zip_data_modified$percent_estimate_race_total_population_one_race_black_or_african_american +
       zip_data_modified$banks_per_pop)

summary(test_regression)
```
